english.title: English Major
english.description: Specializes in training students to be proficient in English in all four skills of listening, speaking, reading, and writing; Have knowledge about the culture and society of countries that use English.

rusia.title: Rusia Major
rusia.description: Specializes in training students to be proficient in Rusia in all four skills of listening, speaking, reading, and writing; Have knowledge about the culture and society of countries that use Rusia.

vietnamese.description: Specializes in training students to be proficient in Vietnamese in all four skills of listening, speaking, reading, and writing; Have knowledge about the culture and society of countries that use Vietnamese.
